title: Broadcasting rights revenue of European soccer leagues 2017/2018
summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Revenue in million euros in each Country on the y axis.
The Revenue in million euros is highest at Country England and lowest at Country Austria.
